Text:
At the end of the movie, the killer does the right thing by killing those scumbags. The black Sherriff lets him go.

I think @ end of the movie, the killer is portrayed as a hero. The girl takes his side even though the killer murders all of her friends.  

Good movie!

Thanks cool_guy_77. Really appreciate you taking some of the fun out of watching this. Dick.

And thanks SaM. I genuinely appreciate you taking the time to make this available =]
